title: Stetson Wool Felt Derby Hat
description: The Stetson Wool Felt Derby Hat is made from the highest quality wool felt for a smooth, soft feel. A classic derby crown meets a 2 inch rolled edge brim for a traditional look, with a bound ribbon edge that matches the simple hat band. Satin lined with a leather interior sweatband, this hat is finished with a subtle Stetson medallion pin and removable feather for a bit of extra flair. Made in the USA
